commented_code:
- `res.json(obj, status)` signature - use `res.json(status, obj)`
     - `res.jsonp(obj, status)` signature - use `res.jsonp(status, obj)`
     - `res.send(body, status)` signature - use `res.send(status, body)`

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -26,6 +26,7 @@ This is the first Express 5.0 alpha release, based off 4.10.1.
     - `res.json(obj, status)` signature - use `res.json(status, obj)`
     - `res.jsonp(obj, status)` signature - use `res.jsonp(status, obj)`
     - `res.send(body, status)` signature - use `res.send(status, body)`
discussion_comments.comment_body:
should this existing line be rewritten to: 

```
     - `res.send(body, status)` signature - use `res.status(status).send(body)`
```

?
